sourcesContent:
<button 
style = "background-color: rgb(82, 0, 0)"
*ngIf="value == 'O'">
{{ value }}</button>

<button 
style = "background-color: rgb(183, 0, 0)"
*ngIf="value == 'X'">
{{ value }}</button>

<button 
style = "background-color: rgb(182, 182, 182)"
*ngIf="!value">
{{ value }}</button>
import { Component, Input} from '@angular/core';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-square',
  templateUrl: './square.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./square.component.scss']
})
export class SquareComponent {
  @Input() value: string;
}
